body: Hi Pietro, I'd like to suggest you to try this out: go to **Tools/Options/View/Display Modes/Shaded** and change backface color to something bright, toxic or glamorous (in my case acid green) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/uYW5k4p411xSb138yex5d6nF-HD-YjXq6gCz5eBYW*bkBRECVIyinYD3xHtQ7jdTxVyxTJxRxYyd0ZGfOzD3HCJdw9-hrrr9/Capture.PNG) This way you will always know which side faces what direction.
